content.rendered:
“We sustain the health and well-being of all our smart pets, We cherish smart pets as companions for our buyers”
Who We Are

We treat our smart pets like family and we are sure you do too. Our mission is to present our buyers with all the right information they need to become better smart pets’ friend.

What We Do

We are dedicated to keep all our smart pets healthy, nourished and groomed so that whenever a buyer takes a Teacup Poodle to his home he’ll get a unique and desired Teacup Poodle as a family member.

Why We Do It

Dogs have always been loyal pets to their owners. The Teacup Poodle has a glorious coat, smiling, foxy face, and vivacious personality which have helped them to become a popular puppy breed. So we are helping people worldwide to get their desired companions.

We Love Pets
If you would like to take the first steps toward finding out about bringing home a Classic Heritage Teacup Poodle Puppies, write me an email about yourself, experience with dogs, or anything that may help me know more about you and the environment you will provide one of our puppies. This is to ensure a thriving future for our puppies. Teacup Poodle Puppies with strong pedigree lines, champion lineage, health clearances and genetic screenings range in price.

Looking For your best friend?
When you invest in a beautiful dog you need to know that the breeder is more committed to the health and well being of their puppies, and the families they are going to, than making money. We are committed to providing exceptional pets to wonderful people. We have a couple fantastic pets that just didn’t quite meet our breeding standards. It was disappointing, but we would rather be confident that we provide you a top quality golden than sell you a cute puppy and hope you never have problems.

Our Social Responsibility

As well as giving your Teacup Poodle’s physical and mental exercise, you should also be prepared to include him in your family activities. The Yorkie is a family dog, and he needs to be with his “pack.” Don’t consider getting a Yorkie unless you’re willing to have him in the house with you, underfoot, every day.

Mission Statement

Our core belief is that our dog’s needs are of the utmost importance. Our entire family is committed to meeting those needs. As a result, a high percentage of our business is from repeat customers and referrals. We would welcome the opportunity to earn your trust and deliver only the best dogs and dog services.

Value Added Services

All puppies are implanted with Microchip ID before they leave our care so they will hopefully never be lost or abandoned. If they can’t get in touch with the puppies owner the microchip recovery service will call me and I will take the puppy/dog back until I am able to get in touch with you.
